attributes.action: remove Uriah Rennie from the referee list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Uriah Rennie is a referee who is totaly commited to himself rather then the interest of the game,I therefore petition the prime minister to remove this useless referee from english sport before he destroys the reputation of our glorious game.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
